  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    SamuraiSpinAttackComponent
    负责：生成“剑”实体 + 安装三种攻击组件 + 处理输入并转发给控制器。 注意：SwordFactory.createSword(...) 需要只创建“视觉+物理”的剑， 不要再往里挂旧的 SwordJabPhysicsComponent。
    SkillCooldowns
    Multi-skill independent cooldown manager.
    SkillCooldowns.SkillCooldownInfo
    Event payload: single object to avoid overloaded trigger signatures.
    SwordAppearanceComponent
    Keeps the sword sprite in sync with the Samurai's level.
    SwordLevelSyncComponent
    Syncs the sword's gameplay stats with the Samurai's level.
    SwordQiAnimatorPng
    Wrapper for the Samurai “Sword Qi” animation using a PNG sprite sheet.
